get.description: Retrieves the list of accounts.

parameters.name: fetchLabels
parameters.description: If true, includes the labels on an account in the output. Could slow request response time.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description:
Projection
This field contains a comma-separated list of fields you'd like to get in
a result. No new fields can be added, only existing ones can be filtered.
To specify a field 'id' of a structure 'plan' use 'plan.id'.
To specify all fields of a structure 'labels' use 'labels.*'.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description:
Order criteria.

The syntax of this parameter is similar to the syntax of the _order by_ clause of
a SQL statement. For example, in order to sort the
accounts descending by name identifier the value should be:

```sql
name desc
```

If the parameter isn't provided, or if the value is empty, then the order of the
results is undefined.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Index of the requested page, where one corresponds to the first page.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description:
Search criteria.

The syntax of this parameter is similar to the syntax of the _where_ clause
of an SQL statement, but using the names of the attributes of the account
instead of the names of the columns of a table. For example, in order to
retrieve accounts with username starting with my:

```sql
username like 'my%'
```

If the parameter isn't provided, or if the value is empty, then all the
items that the user has permission to see will be returned.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Maximum number of items that will be contained in the returned page.

page.description: Index of the requested page, where one corresponds to the first page.

size.description: Maximum number of items that will be contained in the returned page.

total.description:
Total number of items of the collection that match the search criteria,
regardless of the size of the page.

get.description: Retrieves the details of the account.

Retrieves the list of labels of the account/organization/subscription.

IMPORTANT: This collection doesn't currently support paging or searching, so the returned
`page` will always be 1 and `size` and `total` will always be the total number of labels
of the account/organization/subscription.

parameters.name: page

Index of the returned page, where one corresponds to the first page. As this
collection doesn't support paging the result will always be `1`.

parameters.name: size

doesn't support paging or searching the result will always be the total number of
labels of the account/organization/subscription.

size.description:
Number of items that will be contained in the returned page. As this collection
doesn't support paging or searching the result will always be the total number of
labels of the account/organization/subscription.

total.description:
Total number of items of the collection that match the search criteria,
regardless of the size of the page. As this collection doesn't support paging or
searching the result will always be the total number of labels of the account/organization/subscription.

kind.description: Indicates the type of this object. Will be 'Account' if this is a complete object or 'AccountLink' if it is just a link.

rhit_account_id.description: RhitAccountID will be deprecated in favor of RhitWebUserId

BillingModel.description: Billing model for subscripiton and reserved_resource resources.

kind.description: Indicates the type of this object. Will be 'BillingModelItem' if this is a complete object or 'BillingModelItemLink' if it is just a link.

billing_model_type.description: BillingModelType is the type of the BillingModel. e.g. standard, marketplace.

description.description: Single line description of the billing model.

display_name.description: User friendly display name of the billing model.

marketplace.description: Indicates the marketplace of the billing model. e.g. gcp, aws, etc.

Capability.description: Capability model that represents internal labels with a key that matches a set list defined in AMS (defined in pkg/api/capability_types.go).

inherited.description: Dynamic attribute of the capability that tells us that this capability was inherited from the subscription's organization.

value.description: Value that can be assigned to the capability (eg. "true", "false" etc).

kind.description: Indicates the type of this object. Will be 'CloudResource' if this is a complete object or 'CloudResourceLink' if it is just a link.

name.description: Name of the default capability (the key).

kind.description: Indicates the type of this object. Will be 'DeletedSubscription' if this is a complete object or 'DeletedSubscriptionLink' if it is just a link.
Indicates the type of this object. Will be 'FeatureToggle' if this is a complete object or 'FeatureToggleLink' if it is just a link.

GenericNotifyDetailsResponse.description: class that defines notify details response in general.

kind.description: Indicates the type of this object. Will be 'GenericNotifyDetailsResponse' if this is a complete object or 'GenericNotifyDetailsResponseLink' if it is just a link.

associates.description: Retrieved List of associates email address.

items.description: Retrieved list of additional notify details parameters key-value.

kind.description: Indicates the type of this object. Will be 'Label' if this is a complete object or 'LabelLink' if it is just a link.

NotificationDetailsRequest.description:
This struct is a request to get a templated email to a user related to this.
subscription/cluster.

bcc_address.description: The BCC address to be included on the email that is sent.

cluster_id.description: Indicates which Cluster (internal id) the resource type belongs to.

cluster_uuid.description: Indicates which Cluster (external id) the resource type belongs to.

include_red_hat_associates.description: Indicates whether to include red hat associates in the email notification.

internal_only.description: Indicates whether the service log is internal only to RH.

subscription_id.description: Indicates which Subscription the resource type belongs to.

NotificationDetailsResponse.description: This class is a single response item for the notify details list.

kind.description: Indicates the type of this object. Will be 'NotificationDetailsResponse' if this is a complete object or 'NotificationDetailsResponseLink' if it is just a link.

key.description: Indicates the key of the response parameter.

value.description: Indicates the value of the response parameter.

kind.description: Indicates the type of this object. Will be 'Organization' if this is a complete object or 'OrganizationLink' if it is just a link.
Indicates the type of this object. Will be 'Permission' if this is a complete object or 'PermissionLink' if it is just a link.
Indicates the type of this object. Will be 'Plan' if this is a complete object or 'PlanLink' if it is just a link.
Indicates the type of this object. Will be 'Registry' if this is a complete object or 'RegistryLink' if it is just a link.
Indicates the type of this object. Will be 'RegistryCredential' if this is a complete object or 'RegistryCredentialLink' if it is just a link.

RelatedResource.description: Resource which can be provisioned using the allowed quota.

kind.description: Indicates the type of this object. Will be 'Resource' if this is a complete object or 'ResourceLink' if it is just a link.

resource_name.description: platform-specific name, such as "M5.2Xlarge" for a type of EC2 node

kind.description: Indicates the type of this object. Will be 'ResourceQuota' if this is a complete object or 'ResourceQuotaLink' if it is just a link.
Indicates the type of this object. Will be 'Role' if this is a complete object or 'RoleLink' if it is just a link.
Indicates the type of this object. Will be 'RoleBinding' if this is a complete object or 'RoleBindingLink' if it is just a link.
Indicates the type of this object. Will be 'SkuRule' if this is a complete object or 'SkuRuleLink' if it is just a link.

allowed.description: Specifies the allowed parameter for calculation

kind.description: Indicates the type of this object. Will be 'Subscription' if this is a complete object or 'SubscriptionLink' if it is just a link.

creator.description: Link to the account that created the subscription.

last_reconcile_date.description: Last time this subscription were reconciled about cluster usage.

last_released_at.description: Last time status was set to Released for this cluster/subscription.

last_telemetry_date.description: Last telemetry authorization request for this  cluster/subscription in Unix time

metrics.description: Metrics array. One or zero elements will present.

provenance.description: The origin of cluster registration (values are defined in AMS at pkg/api/subscription_types.go).

released.description: Flag used to denote whether or not the owner of the cluster has released the ownership and ready to be transferred to a different user.

trial_end_date.description: If the subscription is a trial, date the trial ends.

SubscriptionMetrics.description: Each field is a metric fetched for a specific Subscription's cluster.

kind.description: Indicates the type of this object. Will be 'SummaryDashboard' if this is a complete object or 'SummaryDashboardLink' if it is just a link.
Indicates the type of this object. Will be 'SupportCaseRequest' if this is a complete object or 'SupportCaseRequestLink' if it is just a link.

cluster_id.description: (optional) cluster id of the cluster on which we create the support case for.

cluster_uuid.description: (optional) cluster uuid of the cluster on which we create the support case for.

event_stream_id.description: (optional) event stream id for the support case so we could track it.

subscription_id.description: (optional) subscription id of the subscription on which we create the support case for.

kind.description: Indicates the type of this object. Will be 'SupportCaseResponse' if this is a complete object or 'SupportCaseResponseLink' if it is just a link.

cluster_id.description: (optional) cluster id of the cluster on which we created the support case for.

cluster_uuid.description: (optional) cluster uuid of the cluster on which we created the support case for.

subscription_id.description: (optional) subscription id of the subscription on which we created the support case for.

TemplateParameter.description:
A template parameter is used in an email to replace placeholder content with
values specific to the email recipient.

content.description: The content that will replace the template parameter in the email

name.description: Name of the value to be replaced

authorization_token.description: The pull secret of a given account

kind.description: Indicates the type of this object. Will always be 'Error'

code.description: Globally unique code of the error, composed of the unique identifier of the API and the numeric identifier of the error. For example, for if the numeric identifier of the error is `93` and the identifier of the API is `clusters_mgmt` then the code will be `CLUSTERS-MGMT-93`.

reason.description: Human readable description of the error.
